name: Mike
line: Is that... I never gave up on you. I called you every night. Every night for...

name: Mike
line: Why didn't you tell me you were there? That you were okay?

name: Mike
line: The hell is this? Where you been?

name: Mike
line: You've been hiding her. You've been hiding her this whole time!

name: Hopper
line: Listen. Listen to me. The more people know about her, the more danger she's in. And the more danger you and your family are in...

name: Mike
line: So I should be thanking you?

name: Hopper
line: I'm not asking you to thank me! I'm asking you to try to understand.

name: Hopper
line: That's fine. That's fine! Just do not blame her! All right? She's upset enough as it is.

name: Mike
line: I don't blame her! I blame you! I blame you!

name: Mike
line: No! Nothing about this is okay! Nothing about this is okay!

name: Mike
line: You're a stupid, disgusting, lying piece of shit!

name: Mike
line: Stop it! Stop it! Liar! Liar!

name: Hopper
line: You're okay, kid. You're okay. I'm sorry, kid.

name: Dustin
line: We talked about you pretty much every day.

name: Max
line: Eleven? Hey. Um, I'm Max. I've heard a lot about you.

name: Joyce
line: What else did you see? You opened this gate before, right?

name: Joyce
line: Do you think if we got you back there, that you could close it?

name: Karen
line: Ted! Would you please get that? Ted! Hold on, please. Oh. Hi.

name: Karen
line: I, uh, didn't realize Nancy had a sister.

name: Billy
line: Um, I'm sorry, and you are? Billy. Billy Hargrove.

name: Karen
line: You must be here for Nancy.

name: Billy
line: Nancy? No, no, no. Not my type. Uh... No, actually, I am looking for my little sister Max. Goes by Maxine. She's been missing all day, and, uh, to be honest with you, I've been worried sick, you know, so...

name: Billy
line: I thought she was at Lucas', but Mrs. Sinclair said your house is the... the designated hangout, so, you know... Here I am.

name: Karen
line: Their driveway is pretty dark this time of night. So drive slowly.

name: Karen
line: And when you see Mike, tell him to come home already, okay?

name: Billy
line: You're a real lifesaver, you know that?

name: Hopper
line: It's not like it was before. It's grown. A lot. And, I mean, that's considering we can get in there. The place is crawling with those dogs.

name: Dustin
line: I said, uh, Demo-dogs. Like Demogorgon and dogs. You put them together, it sounds pretty badass...

name: Hopper
line: How is this important right now?

name: Eleven
line: I'm hearing you. I can do it.

name: Mike
line: Even if El can, there's still another problem. If the brain dies, the body dies.

name: Hopper
line: I thought that was the whole point.

name: Mike
line: It is, but if we're really right about this... I mean, if El closes the gate and kills the mind flayer's army... Will's a part of that army. Closing the gate will kill him.

name: Joyce
line: It's what Will kept saying to me. He likes it cold. We keep giving it what it wants.

name: Jonathan
line: If this is a virus, and Will's the host, then...

name: Joyce
line: Then we need to make the host uninhabitable.

name: Nancy
line: So if he likes it cold...

name: Joyce
line: We need to burn it out of him.

name: Jonathan
line: We have to do it somewhere he doesn't know this time.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, somewhere far away. Take Denfield, then you'll see a large oak tree. You're gonna swing a right. That road is gonna dead-end. And it's about a five-minute walk from there.

name: Jonathan
line: Okay. Denfield to oak tree. Swing a right. That's it. But it's channel ten, right?

name: Hopper
line: It's channel ten. Listen... You let me know when that thing is out of him.

name: Nancy
line: With Jonathan. No, I'm... I'm not just gonna leave Mike.

name: Steve
line: No one's leaving anyone. I may be a pretty shitty boyfriend, but... turns out I'm actually a pretty damn good babysitter.

name: Nancy
line: Just be careful, okay? I can't lose you again.

name: Hopper
line: El... Come on, let's go. It's time.

name: Hopper
line: So, what, we're just not gonna talk about it, huh?

name: Hopper
line: Oh, I don't know. I'm just curious, you know, why all of a sudden you look like some kind of MTV punk. I'm not mad, kid. I just want to know where you've been. That's all.

name: Hopper
line: A big truck? Whose truck was it?

name: Hopper
line: Okay. So let me just get this straight in my head. So a nice man in a big truck, he drove you to your mama's, and then what? Your Aunt Becky gave you those clothes and that makeup?

name: Hopper
line: Mmm-mmm. No. No, this isn't on you, kid. I should've been there. I should never have lied to you about your mom. Or about when you could leave. A lot of things I shouldn't have done. Sometimes I feel like I'm... Like I'm just some kind of black hole or something.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, it's a... You know, it's this thing in outer space. It's like, it sucks everything towards it and destroys it. Sarah had a picture book about outer space. She loved it.

name: Hopper
line: Sarah? Sarah's my girl. She's my little girl.

name: Hopper
line: Well, that's kind of the thing, kid. She, uh... She left us.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. The black hole. It got her. And somehow... I've just been scared, you know? I've just been scared that it would take you, too. I think that's why I get... so mad. I'm so sorry. For everything. I could be so... so...

name: Hopper
line: I guess we broke our rule. I don't hate it, by the way. This whole... look. It's kinda cool.

name: Steve
line: All right. It should fit now.

name: Steve
line: Yes, it is, okay? This is a ground-breaking scientific discovery. We can't just bury it like some common mammal, okay? It's not a dog.

name: Dustin
line: All right, all right, all right.

name: Steve
line: But you're explaining this to Mrs. Byers, all right? Christ. Help me out.

name: Dustin
line: What am I supposed to do?

name: Dustin
line: All right, I got the door.

name: Lucas
line: Mike, would you just stop already?

name: Mike
line: You weren't in there, okay, Lucas? That lab is swarming with hundreds of those dogs.

name: Lucas
line: The chief will take care of her.

name: Mike
line: Listen, dude, a coach calls a play in a game, bottom line, you execute it. All right?

name: Lucas
line: Okay, first of all, this isn't some stupid sports game. And second, we're not even in the game. We're on the bench.

name: Steve
line: Right, yeah, we're on the bench, so, uh, there's nothing we can do.

name: Dustin
line: That's not entirely true. I mean, these Demo-dogs, they have a hive mind. When they ran away from the bus, they were called away.

name: Mike
line: Maybe we can draw them from the lab.

name: Steve
line: Clear a path to the gate.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, and then we all die.

name: Dustin
line: No, that's not a point of view, man. That's a fact.

name: Mike
line: I got it! This is where the chief dug his hole. This is our way into the tunnel. So... Here, right here. This is like a hub. So you got all the tunnels feeding in here. Maybe if we set this on fire...

name: Dustin
line: The mind flayer would call away his army.

name: Lucas
line: They'd all come to stop us.

name: Mike
line: We circle back to the exit.

name: Dustin
line: By the time they realize we're gone...

name: Mike
line: El would be at the gate.

name: Steve
line: Hey. Hey! Hey! This is not happening.

name: Steve
line: No, no, no, no, no. No buts. I promised I'd keep you shitheads safe, and that's exactly what I plan on. We're staying here. On the bench. And we're waiting for the starting team to do their job. Does everybody understand?

name: Mike
line: This isn't a stupid sports game.

name: Steve
line: I said does everybody understand that? I need a yes.

name: Max
line: It's my brother. He can't know I'm here. He'll kill me. He'll kill us.

name: Billy
line: Am I dreaming, or is that you, Harrington?

name: Steve
line: Yeah, it's me. Don't cream your pants.

name: Billy
line: What are you doing here, amigo?

name: Steve
line: I could ask you the same thing. Amigo.

name: Billy
line: Looking for my stepsister. A little birdie told me she was here.

name: Steve
line: Huh, that's weird. I don't know her.

name: Billy
line: Small? Redhead? Bit of a bitch.

name: Steve
line: Doesn't ring a bell. Sorry, buddy.

name: Billy
line: You know, I don't know, this... This whole situation, Harrington, I don't know. It's giving me the heebie-jeebies.

name: Billy
line: My 13-year-old sister goes missing all day. And then I find her with you in a stranger's house. And you lie to me about it.

name: Steve
line: Man, were you dropped too much as a child, or what? I don't know what you don't understand about what I just said. She's not here.

name: Billy
line: I told you to plant your feet.

name: Billy
line: Well, well, well. Lucas Sinclair. What a surprise. I thought I told you to stay away from him, Max.

name: Billy
line: You disobeyed me. And you know what happens when you disobey me.

name: Billy
line: Since Maxine won't listen to me, maybe you will. You stay away from her. Stay away from her! You hear me?

name: Billy
line: Looks like you got some fire in you after all, huh? I've been waiting to meet this King Steve everybody's been telling me so much about.

name: Dustin
line: Murder the son of a bitch! Now! Now!

name: Dustin
line: Kill the son of a bitch!

name: Billy
line: No one tells me what to do! Whoo! Get up!

name: Billy
line: The hell is this? You little shit, what did you do? What did you do?

name: Max
line: From here on out, you leave me and my friends alone. Do you understand?

name: Max
line: Say you understand! Say it! Say it!

name: Jonathan
line: Are you sure this is a good idea?

name: Joyce
line: This thing has had Will long enough. Let's kill the son of a bitch.

name: Hopper
line: All right. You let me do the heavy lifting up front, all right? You save your strength till we're below. You okay?

name: Dustin
line: Nancy? No, don't touch it. Hey, buddy... It's okay. You put up a good fight. He kicked your ass, but you put up a fight. You're okay.

name: Lucas
line: Okay, you're gonna keep straight for a half a mile, then make a left on Mount Sinai.

name: Steve
line: What's going on? Oh, my God!

name: Dustin
line: They were gonna leave you behind.

name: Dustin
line: I promised that you'd be cool, okay?

name: Steve
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. What's going on? Oh, my God. No! Whoa! Stop the car. Slow down.

name: Mike
line: I told you he'd freak out.

name: Max
line: Everybody shut up! I'm trying to focus!

name: Lucas
line: Oh, wait, that's Mount Sinai. Make a left.

name: Will
line: What's happening? It hurts. It hurts! It hurts! It hurts! Let me go! Let me go! It hurts! It hurts! Let me go! Let me go! It hurts!

name: Will
line: Let me go! Let me go! Let me go!

name: Steve
line: Guys. Oh, no. Guys. Hey, where do you think you're going? What are you, deaf? Hello? We are not going down there right now. I made myself clear. Hey, there's no chance we're going to that hole, all right? This ends right now!

name: Dustin
line: Steve, you're upset, I get it. But the bottom line is, a party member requires assistance, and it is our duty to provide that assistance. Now, I know you promised Nance that you would keep us safe. So, keep us safe.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, I'm pretty sure it's this way.

name: Dustin
line: You're pretty sure, or you're certain?

name: Mike
line: I'm 100% sure. Just follow me and you'll know.

name: Steve
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey, hey. I don't think so.

name: Steve
line: Any of you little shits die down here, I'm getting the blame. Got it, dipshit? From here on out, I'm leading the way. Come on, let's go. Come on. Hey, a little hustle.

name: Hopper
line: Stay here. Oh, shit. Hey, Doc.

name: Owens
line: Those suckers got you pretty good, huh?

name: Hopper
line: It's okay, don't talk. Don't talk. I got you. I got you. I got you. Oh, yeah, I've been meaning to tell you. This is Eleven. Eleven, Doc Owens. Doc Owens, Eleven. She's been staying with me for about a year and she's about to save our asses. Maybe when this is all said and done, maybe you could help her out, too, you know? Maybe you could help her lead, like, a normal life. One where she's not poked and prodded and... treated like some kind of lab rat, you know? I don't know, just a thought. But, uh... think about it. Don't go anywhere.

name: Dustin
line: What the hell? Shit! Help! Help! Help!

name: Dustin
line: It's in my mouth! Some got on my mouth! Shit! I'm okay.

name: Steve
line: All right, Wheeler. I think we found your hub.

name: Will
line: It's not working. It's not working. Mom, are you listening to me?

name: Jonathan
line: How much longer? Look... look at him!

name: Jonathan
line: Wait, Jonathan, Jonathan! His neck! His neck!

name: Steve
line: I am in such deep shit.

name: Joyce
line: Get the hell out of my son!

name: Steve
line: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

name: Joyce
line: Will, baby. Will. Will. Please, Will. Will.

name: Joyce
line: Please. Can you hear me? Please. Will.

name: Jonathan
line: Chief, are you there? Chief, do you copy?

name: Steve
line: Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Hey, this way!

name: Dustin
line: Trust me, please. Hey. It's me, it's me. It's just your friend, it's Dustin. It's Dustin, all right? You remember me? Will you let us pass? Okay, okay, I'm sorry. I'm sorry about the storm cellar. That was a pretty douchey thing to do. You hungry? Yeah? I've got our favorite. See? Nougat. Look at that. Yummy. Here, all right? Eat up, buddy. Come on. Come on. There's plenty. I've got more. Goodbye, buddy.

name: Kali
line: I want you to find something from your past, something that angers you. Now channel it.

name: Max
line: Lucas, come on. Reach for my hand.

name: Dustin
line: Come on! No! This is... Eleven.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: You have a wound, Eleven. A terrible wound.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: And eventually, it will kill you.

name: Hopper
line: Jane! You did good, kid. You did so good.

name: Reporter
line: Since the release of the incendiary tape, the once quiet town of Hawkins, Indiana, has spent time in a place it never expected. The national spotlight. Under mounting pressure, several high-ranking members from the U.S. Department of Energy have admitted involvement in the death and cover-up of Hawkins resident Barbara Holland who died due to exposure to an experimental chemical asphyxiant, which had leaked from the grounds of the lab. We sent our own April Kline to Hawkins to speak to residents, residents who told us they thought they lived in a safe town. The kind of town where, they say, nothing ever happens.

name: Powell
line: Better. Pretty sure my football career is over.

name: Hopper
line: Want some? No way I'm gonna finish it.

name: Powell
line: No. I'm, uh... on a diet.

name: Hopper
line: Well, you're a better man than me.

name: Powell
line: Hey, got a little something for you.

name: Powell
line: Sometimes I impress even myself. Still, I'd let things cool off for a while, if I were you.

name: Powell
line: Want to be safe? I give it a year.

name: Hopper
line: A year? What about one night out?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. How risky would that be?

name: Powell
line: What's so important about one night?

name: Will
line: Do you always have to be filming everything?

name: Jonathan
line: No, no. Just the good stuff.

name: Joyce
line: Are you sure people still dance like this?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, yeah, it's what's happening. Oh, wait. All right, that's enough. One more, okay? Just one more.

name: Lucas
line: We should, you know, get out there, like, do our thing... Stop.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, I love it. But not as much as I love you, Lukey.

name: Lucas
line: Get out of my room! Ow, ow. That hurts.

name: Susan
line: It's gonna be worth it. Promise.

name: Dustin
line: Son of a bitch! Son of a bitch!

name: Susan
line: Where did you see it last?

name: Dustin
line: Right here, where I put it.

name: Susan
line: What's in there that's so important anyway? You look fabulous, baby. Got it. That's your ride. Dusty!

name: Steve
line: All right, buddy, here we are. So, remember, once you get in there...

name: Steve
line: There you go. You're learning, my friend. You're learning.

name: Steve
line: What? Come on. You look great, okay? You look... You look great. Okay? Now you're gonna go in there...

name: Dustin
line: Holy shit. What happened to you?

name: Steve
line: Is there a bird nesting in there?

name: Dustin
line: What do you mean, 'What's wrong'? There's no bird nesting in here, asshole. Okay? I worked hard.

name: Lucas
line: Max... Hey. Um, it's nice, right? You want to, um... You want to, like... You know? Like, just you and me?

name: Max
line: Are you trying to ask me to dance, stalker?

name: Lucas
line: No, of course not. Unless you want to.

name: Girl
line: Hey, Zombie Boy. Do you want to dance?

name: Will
line: Um... I don't... I mean... I mean, yeah. Sure.

name: Dustin
line: Wish me luck, Mike. I'm going in. Stacy.

name: Girl
line: He just broke up with Jennifer.

name: Mike
line: Come on. Let's go. Here. Mmm-hmm. Closer. A little closer. Okay. Now feel the music. The rhythm. Start to move to it. Yeah. There.

name: Mike
line: That's good. Yeah. Okay. You know, out of all of my brother's friends, you're my favorite. You've always been my favorite.

name: Nancy
line: Girls this age are dumb. But give them a few years, and they'll wise up. And, uh, you're gonna drive them nuts.

name: Joyce
line: Hey. Will wanted me to give him some space, so... I'm giving him a few feet.

name: Hopper
line: What do you say? I'm pretty sure that Mr. Cooper retired in the '70s, so... we might be okay. How are you holding up?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. That feeling never goes away. It is true what they say, you know. Every day it does get a little easier.

name: Mike
line: You look beautiful. Do you wanna dance?

name: Mike
line: I don't either. Do you want to figure it out? Like this.
